001package eu.andredick.configuration;
002
003import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.ACOAlgorithm;
004import eu.andredick.aco.ant.ACOAnt;
005import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm;
006import eu.andredick.aco.ant.AbstractAnt;
007import eu.andredick.aco.combination.CombinationFactor;
008import eu.andredick.aco.combination.CombinationSum;
009import eu.andredick.aco.construction.AbstractConstruction;
010import eu.andredick.aco.construction.ConstructionFromSubsets;
011import eu.andredick.aco.heuristic.HeuristicInfoSet;
012import eu.andredick.aco.localsearch.AbstractLocalSearch;
013import eu.andredick.aco.localsearch.LocalSearchAntCover;
014import eu.andredick.aco.localsearch.LocalSearchNone;
015import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.AbstractMasterProcess;
016import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.MasterProcessBasic;
017import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.MasterProcessElitist;
018import eu.andredick.aco.nextstep.AbstractNextStepStrategy;
019import eu.andredick.aco.nextstep.NextStepStrategyOnSubsets;
020import eu.andredick.aco.nextstep.NextStepStrategyOnSubsetsStochastic;
021import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneassociation.PheromoneOnSubsets;
022import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneevaporation.AbstractPheromoneEvaporation;
023import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneevaporation.PheromoneEvaporation;
024import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneinit.AbstractPheromoneInit;
025import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneinit.PheromoneInit;
026import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneperception.AbstractPheromonePerception;
027import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneperception.PerceptionSimple;
028import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneupdate.AbstractPheromoneUpdate;
029import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneupdate.PheromoneUpdateOnSubsets;
030import eu.andredick.aco.solutionquality.SolutionQualityMin;
031import eu.andredick.aco.termination.TerminationCriterion;
032import eu.andredick.scp.SCPSolution;
033import eu.andredick.scp.SCProblem;
034
035public class AlgorithmConfiguration_self extends AbstractAlgorithmConfiguration {
036
037
038    @Override
039    public void prepareConfigParameters() {
040
041        this.configName = "AlgorithmConfiguration_Randomwalk";
042        // 信息素初始值配置
043        ConfigurationParameter<Float> phInitValue =
044                new ConfigurationParameter<>("pheromonInitValue", 0f);
045        this.addConfigurationParameter(phInitValue);
046//        phInitValue.setCurrentValue();
047
048        // 信息素蒸发因子设置
049        ConfigurationParameter<Float> evapFactor =
050                new ConfigurationParameter<>("evaporationFactor", 0.1f);
051        this.addConfigurationParameter(evapFactor);
052//        evapFactor.setCurrentValue();
053
054        // 最大迭代次数设置
055        ConfigurationParameter<Integer> maxIterations =
056                new ConfigurationParameter<>("maxIterations", 100);
057        this.addConfigurationParameter(maxIterations);
058//        maxIterations.setCurrentValue();
059
060        // 蚂蚁种群数量设置
061        this.getParameter("antsize").setCurrentValue(500);
062
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public AbstractAlgorithm create(SCProblem problem) {
067
068        PheromoneOnSubsets pheromoneStructure =
069                new PheromoneOnSubsets(problem);
070
071        float phInitValue = this.getParameter("pheromonInitValue").getCurrentValue().floatValue();
072        AbstractPheromoneInit pheromoneInitRule =
073                new PheromoneInit(phInitValue);
074
075        float evapFactor = this.getParameter("evaporationFactor").getCurrentValue().floatValue();
076        AbstractPheromoneEvaporation evaporationRule;
077        evaporationRule = new PheromoneEvaporation(evapFactor);
078
079        pheromoneStructure.setEvaporationRule(evaporationRule);
080        pheromoneStructure.setPheromoneInitRule(pheromoneInitRule);
081
082        AbstractPheromoneUpdate updateRule =
083                new PheromoneUpdateOnSubsets(pheromoneStructure, new SolutionQualityMin());
084
085        // 设置组合组件
086        // 乘积
087//        float alpha = 0f;
088//        float beta = 0f;
089//        CombinationFactor conbination = new CombinationFactor(alpha, beta);
090        // 加权和
091        float gamma = 0.5f;
092        CombinationSum conbination = new CombinationSum(gamma);
093
094        // 启发式信息设置
095        HeuristicInfoSet heuristicInfoSet = new HeuristicInfoSet();
096        AbstractPheromonePerception perceptionRule = new PerceptionSimple();
097
098        // 设置候选集选择组件
099        AbstractNextStepStrategy nextStepRule =
100                new NextStepStrategyOnSubsets(pheromoneStructure, perceptionRule, heuristicInfoSet, conbination, 0.5f);
101        // 设置解的构造组件
102        AbstractConstruction constructionStrategy =
103                new ConstructionFromSubsets(nextStepRule);
104        //设置局部搜索组件
105        AbstractLocalSearch localSearchStrategy =
106                new LocalSearchAntCover();
107
108        // 设置蚁群数量
109        int antSize = this.getParameter("antsize").getCurrentValue().intValue();
110        AbstractAnt[] ants = new AbstractAnt[antSize];
111        for (int i = 0; i < ants.length; i++) {
112            ants[i] = new ACOAnt<SCPSolution, SCProblem>(problem, updateRule, constructionStrategy, localSearchStrategy);
113        }
114
115        // 设置迭代终止条件
116        TerminationCriterion terminationCriterion =
117                new TerminationCriterion(this.getParameter("maxIterations").getCurrentValue().intValue());
118
119        // 精英策略
120        AbstractMasterProcess masterProcess = new MasterProcessElitist(pheromoneStructure, ants, terminationCriterion);
121
122        return new ACOAlgorithm(masterProcess);
123    }
124
125}
126
